sourcesContent:
/* ─── src/data/constants.js ──────────────────────────────────
   Formwork Kitting & BoQ Optimization — CreaTech PS4 (L&T)
   Backend: Go REST API @ localhost:8080
   ML: Optimization model (integrated by teammate)
──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── */

/* ── Navigation ────────────────────────────────────────────── */
export const NAV_ITEMS = [
  { id: 'overview',    label: 'Overview',      icon: 'LayoutDashboard' },
  { id: 'input',       label: 'Input / BoQ',   icon: 'ClipboardList'   },
  { id: 'kitting',     label: 'Kitting Plan',  icon: 'Layers'          },
  { id: 'inventory',   label: 'Inventory',     icon: 'Package'         },
  { id: 'alerts',      label: 'Alerts',        icon: 'AlertTriangle'   },
  { id: 'history',     label: 'Run History',   icon: 'History'         },
  { id: 'settings',    label: 'Settings',      icon: 'Settings'        },
]

export const TOP_NAV = ['dashboard', 'optimizer', 'inventory', 'reports', 'settings']

/* ── Command Palette ────────────────────────────────────────── */
export const CMD_ITEMS = [
  { label: 'Go to Overview',        hint: '⌘1', icon: 'LayoutDashboard' },
  { label: 'New Optimization Run',  hint: '⌘N', icon: 'ClipboardList'   },
  { label: 'View Kitting Plan',     hint: '⌘2', icon: 'Layers'          },
  { label: 'Check Inventory',       hint: '⌘3', icon: 'Package'         },
  { label: 'Manage Alerts',         hint: '⌘4', icon: 'AlertTriangle'   },
  { label: 'Run History',           hint: '⌘H', icon: 'History'         },
  { label: 'Refresh Data',          hint: '⌘R', icon: 'RefreshCw'       },
  { label: 'Toggle Sidebar',        hint: '⌘B', icon: 'PanelLeft'       },
  { label: 'Export Report',         hint: '⌘D', icon: 'Download'        },
  { label: 'API Settings',          hint: '⌘,', icon: 'Settings'        },
]

/* ── Default Input Template (matches backend schema exactly) ── */
export const DEFAULT_INPUT_ITEMS = [
  {
    element_id:  'Column-A1',
    length:       2.4,
    width:        1.2,
    quantity:     10,
    start_date:  '2026-03-01',
    end_date:    '2026-03-04',
  },
  {
    element_id:  'Column-A2',
    length:       2.4,
    width:        1.2,
    quantity:     10,
    start_date:  '2026-03-05',
    end_date:    '2026-03-08',
  },
  {
    element_id:  'Slab-B1',
    length:       3.0,
    width:        1.5,
    quantity:     25,
    start_date:  '2026-03-02',
    end_date:    '2026-03-10',
  },
]

/* ── Empty row for "Add Row" ────────────────────────────────── */
export const EMPTY_ITEM = {
  element_id: '',
  length:     '',
  width:      '',
  quantity:   '',
  start_date: '',
  end_date:   '',
}

/* ── Element type presets (quick-fill) ──────────────────────── */
export const ELEMENT_PRESETS = [
  { label: 'Column (Standard)',  length: 2.4, width: 1.2 },
  { label: 'Column (Large)',     length: 3.0, width: 1.5 },
  { label: 'Slab (Standard)',    length: 3.0, width: 1.5 },
  { label: 'Slab (Large)',       length: 4.5, width: 2.0 },
  { label: 'Beam (Standard)',    length: 4.0, width: 0.6 },
  { label: 'Beam (Long)',        length: 6.0, width: 0.6 },
  { label: 'Wall Panel',         length: 3.0, width: 0.2 },
  { label: 'Foundation',         length: 2.0, width: 2.0 },
]

/* ── Mock API response — matches Go OptimizationResponse EXACTLY ─
   Go struct fields (snake_case JSON tags):
     original_boq_items          int
     optimized_kits_required     int
     total_repetition_factor     float64
     estimated_cost_savings_percent float64
     kit_details                 []KitDetail
       .dimensions               string   "2.40x1.20"
       .required_qty             int
       .repetition_count         float64
       .used_in_elements         []string
   Extra _prefixed fields are added client-side only (not from Go)
──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── */
export const MOCK_OPTIMIZATION_RESULT = {
  // — Go response fields (exact match) —
  original_boq_items:              45,
  optimized_kits_required:         14,
  total_repetition_factor:         3.21,
  estimated_cost_savings_percent:  68.89,

  kit_details: [
    {
      dimensions:       '2.40x1.20',
      required_qty:     4,
      repetition_count: 5.00,
      used_in_elements: ['Column-A1', 'Column-A2'],
    },
    {
      dimensions:       '3.00x1.50',
      required_qty:     10,
      repetition_count: 2.50,
      used_in_elements: ['Slab-B1'],
    },
  ],

  // — Client-side only (not from Go) —
  _run_id:       'RUN-2026-001',
  _processed_at: '2026-03-01T09:30:00Z',
}

/* ── Alerts ─────────────────────────────────────────────────── */
export const INITIAL_ALERTS = [
  { id: 1, status: 'err',  title: 'Inventory Overrun',        sub: 'KIT-002 exceeds yard capacity',   time: '2m ago',  ack: false },
  { id: 2, status: 'warn', title: 'BoQ Deviation +12%',       sub: 'Slab-B1 quantity mismatch',       time: '15m ago', ack: false },
  { id: 3, status: 'ok',   title: 'KIT-001 Cycle Complete',   sub: 'Column-A1 stripped successfully', time: '1h ago',  ack: true  },
  { id: 4, status: 'warn', title: 'Low Repetition Rate',      sub: 'Foundation elements < 2 reuses',  time: '2h ago',  ack: false },
  { id: 5, status: 'ok',   title: 'Optimization Run Success', sub: 'RUN-2026-001 completed',          time: '3h ago',  ack: true  },
  { id: 6, status: 'err',  title: 'Schedule Conflict',        sub: 'KIT-003 overlap on 2026-03-05',   time: '4h ago',  ack: false },
]

/* ── Run History ─────────────────────────────────────────────── */
export const RUN_HISTORY = [
  { id: 'RUN-2026-001', date: '2026-03-01', elements: 3,  qty: 45,  saving: '30.5%', status: 'completed', kits: 2 },
  { id: 'RUN-2026-002', date: '2026-02-20', elements: 8,  qty: 120, saving: '24.1%', status: 'completed', kits: 5 },
  { id: 'RUN-2026-003', date: '2026-02-15', elements: 5,  qty: 80,  saving: '18.7%', status: 'completed', kits: 3 },
  { id: 'RUN-2026-004', date: '2026-02-10', elements: 12, qty: 200, saving: '35.2%', status: 'completed', kits: 7 },
  { id: 'RUN-2026-005', date: '2026-02-05', elements: 4,  qty: 60,  saving: '—',     status: 'failed',    kits: 0 },
]

/* ── KPI trend (overview chart) ─────────────────────────────── */
export const TREND_DATA = [
  { month: 'Oct', cost: 420000, saving: 60000,  repetition: 62 },
  { month: 'Nov', cost: 395000, saving: 75000,  repetition: 67 },
  { month: 'Dec', cost: 370000, saving: 88000,  repetition: 71 },
  { month: 'Jan', cost: 340000, saving: 102000, repetition: 74 },
  { month: 'Feb', cost: 310000, saving: 115000, repetition: 76 },
  { month: 'Mar', cost: 285000, saving: 87000,  repetition: 78 },
]

/* ── Inventory (current yard state) ─────────────────────────── */
export const INVENTORY_DATA = [
  { kit_id: 'KIT-001', type: 'Column 2.4×1.2', total: 10, deployed: 10, available: 0,  utilization: 100 },
  { kit_id: 'KIT-002', type: 'Slab 3.0×1.5',   total: 25, deployed: 20, available: 5,  utilization: 80  },
  { kit_id: 'KIT-003', type: 'Beam 4.0×0.6',   total: 8,  deployed: 3,  available: 5,  utilization: 37  },
  { kit_id: 'KIT-004', type: 'Wall 3.0×0.2',   total: 15, deployed: 0,  available: 15, utilization: 0   },
]

/* ── Bar chart data (cost vs saving per month) ──────────────── */
export const BAR_DATA = TREND_DATA.map(d => ({
  d:   d.month,
  req: d.cost,
  err: d.saving,
}))

/* ── Activity log pool ──────────────────────────────────────── */
const ACTIVITY_POOL = [
  ['INFO',  'KIT-001 deployed to Zone-A, Column-A1',         'yard-ops'   ],
  ['INFO',  'Stripping complete for Slab-B1 panel 12',       'site-crew'  ],
  ['WARN',  'KIT-002 cleaning delayed — crew unavailable',   'scheduler'  ],
  ['ERROR', 'Mould damage detected on KIT-003 unit 4',       'inspection' ],
  ['INFO',  'BoQ exported to ERP successfully',              'integration'],
  ['INFO',  'Optimization RUN-2026-001 completed',           'ml-engine'  ],
  ['WARN',  'Inventory count mismatch: KIT-002 +3 units',    'inventory'  ],
  ['INFO',  'KIT-001 reset and ready for Column-A2',         'yard-ops'   ],
  ['ERROR', 'Schedule conflict detected: 2026-03-05',        'planner'    ],
  ['DEBUG', 'Repetition rate recalculated: 78.3%',           'ml-engine'  ],
  ['INFO',  'Procurement order raised for KIT-005',          'procurement'],
  ['WARN',  'Cycle time exceeded by 4h on Slab-B1',          'monitor'    ],
  ['INFO',  'Quality check passed — KIT-001 batch 2',        'qc'         ],
  ['DEBUG', 'BoQ diff: +2 units Column detected',            'optimizer'  ],
  ['INFO',  'New optimization request received',             'api-server' ],
]

let logCounter = 1000

export const generateLog = () => {
  const [level, msg, src] = ACTIVITY_POOL[Math.floor(Math.random() * ACTIVITY_POOL.length)]
  const now = new Date()
  return {
    id:    ++logCounter,
    time:  `${String(now.getHours()).padStart(2,'0')}:${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2,'0')}:${String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2,'0')}`,
    level, msg, src,
    isNew: true,
  }
}

export const generateSeedLogs = (count = 12) =>
  Array.from({ length: count }, generateLog).map(l => ({ ...l, isNew: false }))

/* ── Chart helpers (kept for compatibility) ─────────────────── */
export const generateChartPoint = (base = 55, variance = 18) => ({
  t:  new Date().toLocaleTimeString('en', { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit', second: '2-digit' }),
  v:  Math.max(5, Math.min(98, base + (Math.random() - 0.5) * variance * 2)),
  v2: Math.max(5, Math.min(98, base * 0.65 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * variance * 1.5)),
})

export const generateSeedChart = (points = 20) =>
  Array.from({ length: points }, () => generateChartPoint())

/* ── Validation helpers ─────────────────────────────────────── */
export const validateItem = (item) => {
  const errors = {}
  if (!item.element_id?.trim())                             errors.element_id = 'Required'
  if (!item.length   || Number(item.length)   <= 0)        errors.length     = 'Must be > 0'
  if (!item.width    || Number(item.width)    <= 0)        errors.width      = 'Must be > 0'
  if (!item.quantity || Number(item.quantity) <= 0)        errors.quantity   = 'Must be > 0'
  if (!item.start_date)                                    errors.start_date = 'Required'
  if (!item.end_date)                                      errors.end_date   = 'Required'
  if (item.start_date && item.end_date && item.start_date >= item.end_date)
    errors.end_date = 'Must be after start date'
  return errors
}

export const validatePayload = (items) => items.map(validateItem)

/* ── API config (Go backend) ────────────────────────────────── */
export const API_CONFIG = {
  BASE_URL: 'http://localhost:8080',
  ENDPOINTS: {
    OPTIMIZE:  '/api/optimize',     // POST { items: [...] } → optimization result
    RESULTS:   '/api/results',      // GET  → all results
    RESULT:    '/api/results/:id',  // GET  → single run by run_id
    HISTORY:   '/api/history',      // GET  → past runs list
    INVENTORY: '/api/inventory',    // GET  → current yard inventory
    HEALTH:    '/api/health',       // GET  → backend health check
  },
  TIMEOUT_MS: 30000, // 30s — ML model may need time
}
